```{r}
library(tidyverse)

dead_everyone_raw <- read_csv("tabula-here-adults.csv", na="أقل من عام")
colnames(dead_everyone_raw) <- c("id", "idnumber", "name", "gender", "age")

dead_everyone <- dead_everyone_raw |>
  mutate(
    age = if_else(is.na(age), 0, as.double(age)),
    gender = if_else(gender == "ذكر", "m", "f"),
    idnumber1 = str_sub(idnumber, 1, 1)
  )

ggplot(dead_everyone |> filter(age < 1000)) +
  geom_freqpoly(aes(age, after_stat(density), colour = gender)) +
  labs(x = "Age", y = "Percent", colour = "Gender")
```
